Module paths
Package ntnu.idatt2001.ejhaslerjorgfi.actions

Interface Action

All Known Implementing Classes:
GoldAction, HealthAction, InventoryAction, ScoreAction
public interface Action

Action

Action represents an action for future changes in the status to a player. This includes changes in the player's scoresum, health, gold amount or inventory. The interface has the method #execute(Player) that is going to change the status to the player when it's called.
Since:
12.02.2023
Version:
05.03.2023
Author:
Group 24

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method

    void
    execute(Player player)
    Performs the execution of the belonging Action-class on a Player object passed as parameter.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      void execute(Player player)
      Performs the execution of the belonging Action-class on a Player object passed as parameter.
      Parameters:
      player - Player object which the execution will be performed on.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action cannot be executed on the player for any reason, such as the player not existing or lacking the necessary resources to perform the action.
